channel.title: Comments on: Chocolate Truffles and Peanut Butter Fudge – Daring Bakers Challenge August 2011

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: The garden sounds like it will be a real treat once Spring really sets in. The peanut butter fudge sounds amazing, would love to try it with a chocolate biscuit base or some chocolate dripped on top.
item.content:encoded: The garden sounds like it will be a real treat once Spring really sets in. The peanut butter fudge sounds amazing, would love to try it with a chocolate biscuit base or some chocolate dripped on top.

item.title: By: Lina
item.dc:creator: Lina
item.description: Just beautiful Anita!...I guess investing in a good sugar thermometer is very helpful when it comes to tempering chocolate and making delicious peanut butter fudge. I've definitely put a 'tag' on these for a later date! Will visit your blog soon again!
item.content:encoded: Just beautiful Anita!…I guess investing in a good sugar thermometer is very helpful when it comes to tempering chocolate and making delicious peanut butter fudge. I’ve definitely put a ‘tag’ on these for a later date! Will visit your blog soon again!

item.title: By: DOlly
item.dc:creator: DOlly
item.description: delicious.. would be an awesome xmas presernt!!
item.content:encoded: delicious.. would be an awesome xmas presernt!!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I'm not much of a candy-maker, but these sure look fun and delicious! Great photos....love the presentation.
item.content:encoded: I’m not much of a candy-maker, but these sure look fun and delicious! Great photos….love the presentation.

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Your fudge and truffles look great Anita! Wonderful job and I love the idea of peanut butter fudge :)
item.content:encoded: Your fudge and truffles look great Anita! Wonderful job and I love the idea of peanut butter fudge 🙂

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: The truffles and peanut butter fudge were delicious!! I love the photos, they really show the truffles and fudge off to their best advantage, not that would be hard to do!!
item.content:encoded:
The truffles and peanut butter fudge were delicious!!
I love the photos, they really show the truffles and fudge off to their best advantage, not that would be hard to do!!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: These look so amazing :) I still need to do mine. What went wrong with the tempering? I havent done it before and am a tad scared to do it :(
item.content:encoded: These look so amazing 🙂 I still need to do mine. What went wrong with the tempering? I havent done it before and am a tad scared to do it 🙁

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Your truffles and fudge look fantastic and delicious! Wonderful job!!
item.content:encoded: Your truffles and fudge look fantastic and delicious! Wonderful job!!

item.title: By: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.dc:creator: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.description: I just love beautiful little morsels. These look really yummy!
item.content:encoded: I just love beautiful little morsels. These look really yummy!
